body:
*Please add a concise summary of your suggestion here.*

Could spack have some form of install target, where it gets installed on the system for all users?
like `install bin/spack /usr/bin/` and so on?

*Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe it!*

I'd like to provide spack to all multi-user machines, system-wide, preferably having
it in an official Debian package.

*Describe the solution you'd like and the alternatives you have considered.*

Having a Makefile or CMakefile or python3 setup.py to install the spack software, would
be perfect.
title: debian packaging: install target
